title: Suggestion: About issue reporting format
body_html:
I hope there is a universal format to report issues (like PyTorch version, python version, operating system version, CUDA version, steps to reproduce, etc.) like in TensorFlow or VSCode's GitHub repo:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/new
https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode/issues/new
body_text:
I hope there is a universal format to report issues (like PyTorch version, python version, operating system version, CUDA version, steps to reproduce, etc.) like in TensorFlow or VSCode's GitHub repo:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/new
https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode/issues/new
body:
I hope there is a universal format to report issues (like PyTorch version, python version, operating system version, CUDA version, steps to reproduce, etc.) like in TensorFlow or VSCode's GitHub repo:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/new
https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode/issues/new
